pullRequest.title: true and false keywords are highlighted as such when used as ValidId
pullRequest.bodyText:
Enhanced the SemanticHighlightingCalculator to handle the highlighting of keywords used as a feature in the assignment
Signed-off-by: nbhusare neerajbhusare@gmail.com

nodes.bodyText: Could you shift this into an else block for the condition in line 92? e.g. if (SPECIAL...) .. else { default } but only if the text is true or false to reduce the number of emitted highlighting tokens?
